item.title: 7.7 Setting up an Archive via Lifecycle
item.description: 7.7 Setting up archives through lifecycle As one of the use cases of Object Storage, it is widely used for disk image backup and file backup. You are more likely to use a recent backup, but you are less likely to use a backup otherwise, but you often need to keep it for a long period of time, for example. You have a requirement that you want to reduce your Storage costs even a little bit during the retention period.
